bi_etl.scheduler.scheduler module¶

Created on Apr 14, 2015

@author: woodd

class bi_etl.scheduler.scheduler.Scheduler[source]¶

Bases: bi_etl.scheduler.scheduler_interface.SchedulerInterface

Full-scheduler object with memory of active jobs.

check_for_cpu(etl_task)[source]¶

Checks for available CPU, if available it STARTS THE TASK and returns True. If not it returns False

check_for_new_task_commands()[source]¶
Looks in the database repository for new task commands:
  • new task: Creates an ETLTask instance, and checks it’s predesssors.
  • stop_requested: Sends a stop signal to the task
  • kill_requested: Sends s SIGKILL to terminate the task
check_for_previous_instance_tasks()[source]¶

Looks in the database repository for tasks from a previous instance.
